overview: Chadwick Ho is Senior Vice President and General Counsel of Hulu responsible for all aspects of the companyâ€™s business and legal affairs. He received a B.A. degree in Psychology with distinction from Stanford University and a J.D. degree with honors from Harvard Law School. (Source : www.hulu.com)
